title: [Achieve E-sports] Recruiting Coach & Analyst
body:
**Achieve E-Sports**

We are currently recruiting coaching staff, if you are interested please read the requirements below.

**We are Looking for:**
1. An Analyst
2. A Coach

**Requirements:**
1. Working microphone + Discord
2. Willing to dedicate time to the team
3. Previous team experience (Highly regarded but not required)

**Contact:**
If you have any questions feel free to leave a reply below or add "Döc" if you would like to chat one-on-one.

Add "Döc" on the league client for any and all inquiries/applications, for the available positions.

**Regards,**
Achieve E-sports

replies.body: I would like to try out and see what its like, maybe even learn something for myself as well, hmu.
Regarding to this is there a certain rank you have to be?

I could help you. I watch alot of esports and im familiar with analyst and coaching. I usually just keep up to date with patch notes and matchups. Not the best at the games but i could help. Since im a school student i can only do weekends and some weekdays dependant on homework and exams. Ill add you ingame and we shall see from there.
Thanks
